<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74330</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74330</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40dad197-d4fc-424f-2b5d-a32889af46a9#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Visegrád az Anjouk korában</string>
            <string language="en">Visegrád in the age of the Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Visegrád im Alter des Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visegrád dans l'âge de l'Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visegrád na idade do Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visegrád nell'età del Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Visegrαd στην ηλικία του Anjous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visegrád en la edad del Anjous</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kora középkori Dél-Európa bemutatása, a mediterrán vidékek térképe</string>
            <string language="en">The representation of South-Europe in the early Middle Ages, a map of mediterranean regions</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Galla Placidia mauzóleuma,  Theoderich mauzóleuma,  San Vitale,  San Apollinare Nuovo,  San Apollinare in Classe,  </string>
            <string language="en">the mausoleum of Galla Placidi, the mausoleum of Theoderich,  San Vitale,  San Apollinare Nuovo,  San Apollinare in Classe,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Darstellung von Süden-Europa im frühen 
mittleren Alter, eine Karte von Mittelmeerregionen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La représentation de sud-europe dans les 
âges moyens jeune, une carte des régions méditerranéennes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A respresentação de Sul-Europa nas idades 
médias adiantadas, um mapa de regiões mediterranean</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rappresentazione di Sud-Europa in Medio Evo 
giovani, un programma delle regioni mediterranee</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντιπροσώπευση της νότος-Ευρώπης στις νεαρές μέσες 
ηλικίες, ένας χάρτης των περιοχών της Μεσογείου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La representación de Sur-Europa en las edades 
medias tempranas, una correspondencia de regiones mediterráneas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Mausoleum von Galla Placidi, der Mausoleum von 
Theoderich, San Vitale, San Apollinare Nuovo, San Apollinare in 
Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le mausolée du galla Placidi, le mausolée de 
Theoderich, San Vitale, San Apollinare Nuovo, San Apollinare dans 
Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o mausoleum do Galla Placidi, o mausoleum de 
Theoderich, San Vitale, San Apollinare Nuovo, San Apollinare em 
Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il mausoleum del galla Placidi, il mausoleum di 
Theoderich, San Vitale, San Apollinare Nuovo, San Apollinare in 
Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το μαυσωλείο Galla Placidi, το μαυσωλείο Theoderich, 
SAN Vitale, SAN Apollinare Nuovo, SAN Apollinare 
σε Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el mausoleo del galla Placidi, el mausoleo de 
Theoderich, San Vitale, San Apollinare Nuovo, San Apollinare en 
Classe,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74330</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
